description: In the wake of the coronavirus pandemic, we’re turning to photojournalists who can help transport you, virtually, to some of our planet’s most beautiful and compelling places.
title: The World Through a Lens
title_page: The World Through a Lens - The New York Times
maintext: In the wake of the coronavirus pandemic, we’re turning to photojournalists who can help transport you, virtually, to some of our planet’s most beautiful and compelling places.
